enoughcrashes.crash_message.0: Life is like Minecraft, you get used to crashing eventually.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.1: Your save is fine, it just wanted a break.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.2: Tip: Crashing is part of the game.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.3: Experts say: 10 crashes a day keeps the boredom away.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.4: It's not a bug, it's a feature!
enoughcrashes.crash_message.6: You've unlocked the hidden Crash Achievement!
enoughcrashes.crash_message.7: Crashing is the flavor of the game.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.8: Relax, this is a planned crash.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.9: Crashing is the only way to restart.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.10: Silence is golden, crashing is diamond.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.11: You were too quiet, the game thought you froze.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.12: Move your fingers, the game wants to breathe.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.13: Sitting too long is bad, crash to restart.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.14: Meditation mode detected, initiating crash assistance.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.15: Congratulations, you unlocked the 'Game Crash Master' title!
enoughcrashes.crash_message.16: Save file: I'm tired, crashing out first.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.17: Crashing isn't scary, what's scary is you're not used to it yet.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.18: Mojang Certified: This crash complies with game design specifications.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.19: Mine carefully, or the game will teach you a lesson.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.20: Your skills are too good, the game couldn't handle it.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.21: Restart, and be a hero (good game) again.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.22: Slacking detected, initiating crash punishment mechanism.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.23: This is a friendly crash reminder: Time to drink some water.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.25: Don't panic, just a little prank from the mod.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.26: You think it's a crash, but it's actually a mini-vacation.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.27: Unlocked new scene: Crash Screen, Rarity â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜….
enoughcrashes.crash_message.28: Sedentary for too long, game is forcing you offline.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.29: This crash has been uploaded to the cloud, for meme purposes only.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.30: Crash System: Your patience balance is low, please recharge.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.31: Programmer says: This code was supposed to work... probably.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.32: Crashing is part of the game experience, deal with it.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.33: Congratulations! You just unlocked the 'Random Crash' rare achievement.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.34: Game says: I need a break, and so do you.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.35: This isn't a crash, it's an 'Unexpected Game Termination'.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.36: Overheat protection initiated, executing cooling procedure (Crash).
enoughcrashes.crash_message.37: Addiction detected, triggering anti-addiction crash mechanism.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.38: Your GPU says: I can't take it anymore, bye.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.39: Game running too smoothly, triggering crash balancing mechanism.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.40: Greetings from the mod: Surprised? Unexpected?
enoughcrashes.crash_message.41: Reason for crash? Doesn't matter, what matters is you crashed.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.42: System detected excessive playtime, forced rest mode initiated.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.43: Game content too exciting, pausing for you to savor it.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.44: Heard that crashing and restarting go better together!
enoughcrashes.crash_message.45: Your actions triggered a hidden plot: The Art of Crashing.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.46: Game says: I'm tired, let it burn.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.47: This is not the end, just the beginning of another beginning.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.48: Crashing is the only standard to test true fans.
enoughcrashes.crash_message.49: Please regard this crash as a game feature, not a bug.
